sourcesContent:
import "./ahc.css" export default function Ahc14() { return (

How to make good habits inevitable and bad habits impossible

  • The best way to break a bad habit is to make it impractical to do. Increase the friction until you no longer have the option to act
  • A commitment device is a choice you make in the present that locks in better behaviour in the future
  • Single choices or one time purchases that deliver increasing returns over time - buying a good mattress, signing up for a one year gym program
  • Using technology to automate your habits is the most reliable and effective way to guarantee the right behavior
) }
